sentences.english: The Lunar New Year, my family would be my grandparents.
sentences.chinese: 在夏曆新年，我的家庭都將我的祖怙恃。

sentences.english: Most experts feel that age eight is when a child is ready for a summer camp.
sentences.chinese: 大部分專家認爲八歲是孩子準備夏曆營的好時段。

sentences.english: Chinese New Year we will guess lantern riddles.
sentences.chinese: 元旦節，我們慶賀中國夏曆新年。
